turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Hi, could I please get an Americano?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, an Americano sounds great! Would you like any milk or sugar with that?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, I don't want to add anything just to the Merrick channel.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, just a plain Americano. That's coming right up! Would you like to have that for here or to go?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I will take it out, but I want to wait it near the door.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem at all! I'll have it ready for you to go, and you can wait by the door. Anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I want to know what else do you recommend today?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, sure! We have some delicious pastries and a special cake today. Are you in the mood for something sweet or maybe a snack?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, please.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great choice! We have a lovely almond croissant and a chocolate chip cookie. Which one sounds good to you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “be a chocolate chip cookie. I like the sweet chocolate chips very much.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Excellent choice! I'll add that chocolate chip cookie to your order. Is there anything else I can get for you, or are we all set?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “That's all. Thank you. And I want to know what kind of beans do you use for your cat Americano?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, that's a great question! We use a medium roast bean that’s got a nice balance of acidity and richness. I think you'll love it! Anything else you're curious about?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “That's great, thank you and I will wait it next door.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'll have your Americano and cookie ready for you in just a moment. Thanks for stopping by!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, does my Americano is all ready?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Almost ready! Just putting the finishing touches on it. It should be good to go in just a few seconds. Thanks for your patience!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you very much.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! Here you go, your Americano and cookie are all set. Enjoy, and have a great day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you. You too. Have a nice day.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thanks so much! Take care, and feel free to come back anytime. Bye for now!
